recipe.title: Szechuan Sauce
recipe.subtitle: Makes 1C of Sauce
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 cup water 1/2 cup white vinegar 1/2 cup white sugar 1/2 cup soy sauce 1 tbsp. apple cider vinegar 1/2 tsp. sesame seed oil 1/4 tsp. garlic powder 1/4 tsp. onion powder 1/4 tsp. powdered ginger Heaped 1/4 tsp. of marmite 1/4 tsp. of corn syrup 1/4 - 1/2 tbsp. of ground black pepper
recipe.steps: Mix all ingredients on a medium heat. Remove a 1/4 cup of the sauce mixture into a separate bowl. Then add 2 tbsp. of corn starch. Mix, then add this sauce back to the sauce mixture in the pan and stir. Remove a 1/4 cup of the sauce mixture into a separate bowl. Add 1 tbsp. of xanthan gum to the bowl and mix. Add this sauce back to the sauce mixture in the pan, through a strainer and stir. Heat up, and stir the sauce until thick.
